website_summaries.verdict: This two-person tent with mesh panels allows you to stay comfortable in hot weather.
pros: It gives you a mesh canopy with a rain tarp at a good price
Has four large pockets on the inside
cons: You'll have to order a base and ladder system separately

customer_reviews.title: FALSE ADVERTISING AT IT'S FINEST
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT FOR A SUBARU OUTBACK! Notice the vehicle in the picture??? A Subaru Outback! But it cannot mount to the OEM integrated crossbars (AS PICTURED) and neither Tepui or parent company Thule make a crossbar that's suitable for this vehicle. Because this was a gift, we've passed the 30-day return period. I'll repost if I can find any manufacturer that makes a product that will allow this to mount safely and properly. But until then do not buy for any Subaru with integrated crossbars!
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love my tent! Was not very easy to do alone. Definitely make sure you have someone else to help and an extra set of ratchet wrenches. I’ve taken it out on my ‘18 crosstrek and have had no issues. A bit hard to put back together when you’re short and alone but manageable.
customer_reviews.author: Kiersten

customer_reviews.title: Definitely buy this!!!! Here’s why!
customer_reviews.text: This tent is freaking awesome!!! Pros: • Fits on stock crossbars for 2016 Subaru Outback • Very Lightweight • The blue color way is sweet • Easy set up • Affordable • comes with all hardware to install (1 standard wrench + 1 ratchet wrench) Cons: • Very hard to put into stock crossbars (Nothing to do with tent but the cross bars) • The size for 2 people is quite small, it’ll fit perfect for sleeping but not so much to hang out in
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Trinh

customer_reviews.title: We love it!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I just spent three weeks on a road trip across the USA (Michigan to California and back), and we slept in the tent for more than half of it. We absolutely love how easy it is to set up and take down. The only thing we added was a foam topper, as the mattress provided can be a little too thin for an extended use, like ours. We were able to insert the foam topper into the zipped mattress cover, which was helpful.
customer_reviews.author: G. Reveilleau

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: This tent is awesome. Very easy set up and break down (5 minutes each). I am just over 6 feet tall and I just fit in it. My wife and I sleep in it and it is snug but we fit just fine. The bed could be a little more comfortable. I just bought a cheap foam topper and it’s much better. Definitely recommend this tent.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Robert Gillis

customer_reviews.title: Great tent for the price
customer_reviews.text: Awesome tent. Instructions that came with it were very clear and anything you missed was in the video that was provided. The material seems pretty sturdy. Slight wind noise but to be expected with a box on top of your car. Really made for a single person or a very close relationship. Definitely will recommend to my friends
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the tent, but damaged during shipping.
customer_reviews.text: Tent was damaged when arrived. 2 large dents in the base and railing bent.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: great quality
customer_reviews.text: I love this tent it is the perfect size for me and my girlfriend and looks awesome. The wind noise can be a bit crazy at times but that is expected. The build quality is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Antoney largaespada

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable tent. If you’re over 5’11 it will be too small though.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: great tent
customer_reviews.text: perfect for one person or for 2 very loving couple and one Yorkie :)
customer_reviews.author: gwi

customer_reviews.title: You’ll never regret this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great roof top tent and a great price. There is nothing better than feeling save a secure sleeping up off the ground. I will never sleep in a tent on the ground again. I’ll never wake up wondering what that noise was outside! I do have one recommendation, go try one out in person so you get the right size. The Ayer is the smallest one Tepui has and it’s perfect for my needs for now but I think in the future I will end up buying the next size up.
customer_reviews.author: FJforrest

customer_reviews.title: Best Built Rooftop Tent Available -
customer_reviews.text: First off never mind the moron trolls that have put 1 star reviews on this. It's 100% the best built and highest quality for any rooftop tent. Everything is such high quality I'm so happy and this will last longer than any tent on the market or that I've owned. very comfortable and at night while in MOAB had the top open and could see the stars and let in a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: HB

customer_reviews.title: Mattress too stiff, back pain
customer_reviews.text: Pro: Great construction and materials, helpful company/ customer support. Con: The foam mattress is too stiff to sleep on. Unbearable. Only reason I returned it. Tepui needs to adjust their product. Yakima’s mattress is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Max

product_meta.title: Tepui Explorer Ayer Rooftop Tent
product_meta.description: Designed to withstand the elements of any season making this tent perfect for any year-round adventure.
feature_bullets: Four season tent perfect for smaller SUVs and vehicles
Can accommodate up to two people
High-quality 600D rip stop and a 260 g poly-cotton blend fabric protect from the heaviest rain and winds
Includes high density 2-1/2 inch foam mattress
Mesh panels offer plenty of ventilation and open for more airflow
Four large internal pockets for storing gear and camping accessories
Easily swap out the canopy depending on the season and weather conditions (Additional canopies sold separately)
Add a privacy annex to add additional space and protection from the elements (Annex sold separately)
Please see new Thule Tepui item available Part Number: 901200
